element.name: rpbody
element.sql: SELECT ri.item articul, ri.name artname, SUM(ri.quantity * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), -1, 1)) itqtt, SUM((ri.total + ri.discount) * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), -1, 1)) itemtot, SUM(ri.discount * IF(r.type IN (1, 4, 9), 1, -1)) itemdsc FROM ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_header r INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_footer f USE INDEX (date) ON f.cash_id = r.cash_id AND f.id = r.id AND f.`date` >= :pFrom AND f.`date` <= :pTo INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_in_pos tip ON tip.cash_id = r.cash_id INNER JOIN ukmserver.trm_out_receipt_item ri ON ri.cash_id = r.cash_id AND ri.receipt_header = r.id AND ri.type=0 WHERE f.result = 0 AND tip.store_id = :pstore AND ri.classif LIKE CONCAT('.', :partclass, '%') GROUP BY ri.item, ri.name
